original_title: 交響詩篇エウレカセブン ポケットが虹でいっぱい
overview: Renton, son of scientists, and Eureka, a girl who can't live under the sun, are raised together when very young and become very attached to each other. Powerless to prevent Eureka from being taken away Renton vows to rescue her and enters the military.
tagline: Their love is the key to mankind's future.
title: Psalms of Planets Eureka Seven: Good Night, Sleep Tight, Young Lovers
